name: Marker Griffon 13 ID Bindings
description: The Griffon 13 is the lighter version of the Marker Jester, but in no way is it more delicate. It's a performance binding that transfers power from your boots straight down to your skis. Durable, predictable and reliable, it's compatible with both AT and alpine boots.Sole ID technology makes it compatible with both alpine soles and alpine touring soles.Triple Pivot Elite toes: spring is inserted horizontally with a sole plate inclined 5 degrees to absorb energy, reduce the risk of early release and optimize power transmission.Stainless steel anti-friction glide plate is height adjustable and releases clean, unhindered by dirt, snow and ice.Inter Pivot 3 heel has improved power transmission and energy absorption.Maximum rider weight is 120kg.
